This shark game is really fun, also entertaining BUT, you will get bored really fast! I played the game for about 23 minutes and I’m bored already. It’s a fun game to play for a couple minutes but then  you get bored. I wouldn’t recommend buying the skins and gems.... Get this game if you will...just saying when your done or get bored playing it, delete the downloads so you have more space. THANKS FOR READING!!!!!!!! *NEW EDIT* Thanks for the response, and thank you for the new update! I love this game now but I’m still going to keep the 3 star for other viewers to see. In my head my star review is a 4. I still don’t recommend buying the stuff tho. This game is the best the way that the crunch sounds is so satisfying and it is great when you play extinct mode

Hi, so I’ve played this game for a year or so, can’t remember lol. But I’m into the game where I have Big mama the killer orca/ whale   (Forgot his name) and Mr. Snappy ( My personal favorite shark) and Robo one. Still working for the magic one, zombie, toxic ( forgot name, something like that), apex sharks, and the newest shark obtained  through quests. I just want to say I love the game, it’s challenging but not too challenging , and I think I’m getting pretty good at it. I enjoy playing extinction because it’s even more challenging and you can get pearls for the apex sharks. I enjoy the content and constant updates for new content. My highest is I think 34 mill. Eh. Kinda low trying to get it higher. But I just wanna say to creators please keep updating and keep up the awesome work. 👍👍. 😁

And the sharks look so much better!!! keep making more games!!!!

title.label: It’s very fun but one thing...

content.label: You expect to be a shark in this game and it will be simple. Well it’s not, rather boring it’s fun! You can customize the shark and have pets and more! I love it. It’s a great idea, but It’s just one thing. It takes so long to get new sharks. Witch is fine, but I just really don’t prefer it. I play this game for a little then come back after day after day. I like how you can see trailers and unlock different sharks way faster by doing the interdiction! It’s good. This is my opinion, but I don’t know about other people. Thank you for letting me say my thoughts to this game.
I have been trying to download the game but it won’t download and idk why

This game is kind of a rip-off to me! I spent 25 dollars on this game to get Sharkjira. I did all 90 quests and I unlocked the shark. Then the game told me to spend 6,000 pearls or 38 more quests. So I did 38 more quests because I don’t have 6,000 pearls. When I was done doing the rest of the quests I went to go use him. But when I did I still had to pay 6,000 pearls!!!
